mapper.select: SELECT * FROM news WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM news WHERE status = 0 AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time ASC

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE deleted = 0) AS totalNews, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE status = #{pendingStatus} AND deleted = 0) AS pendingNews, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE status = #{approvedStatus} AND deleted = 0) AS publishedNews, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE status = #{rejectedStatus} AND deleted = 0) AS rejectedNews, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE status = #{draftStatus} AND deleted = 0) AS draftNews, (SELECT SUM(view_count) FROM news WHERE deleted = 0) AS totalViews, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM user_view_logs WHERE resource_type = 'NEWS' AND DATE(view_time) = CURDATE()) AS todayViews, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT id) FROM users WHERE status = 1) AS totalUsers, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM user_operation_logs WHERE resource_type = 'NEWS' AND operation_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) AS activeUsers FROM DUAL

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(view_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, COUNT(id) AS views FROM user_view_logs WHERE resource_type = 'NEWS' AND view_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} + INTERVAL 1 DAY - INTERVAL 1 SECOND GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC
